cru_cld_clim_1931-1940

Available formats: NetCDF [.nc] data, help;
GeoTiff [.tif] data, help;
Obtain data from tiff colour index by scaling by 0.4

History: from cru_ts_2_10.1901-2002.cld: Tyndall Centre grim file created on 22.01.2004 at 13:52 by Dr. Tim Mitchell: converted to netcdf using IDL

Variable name: Cloud area fraction

Units: percentage
